Package harrypotter

Interface HPActionInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActionInterface, java.lang.Comparable<ActionInterface>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Attack, Cast, Drink, Give, HPAction, HPAffordance, Leave, Move, Take
    public interface HPActionInterface
extends ActionInterface
    Interface that allows HPAction and HPAffordance to have a common ancestor (and thus be stored in the same structures) despite one extending Action and the other extending Affordance.
    Author:
    ram

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void act​(HPActor a)
      The method that defines what needs to be performed when this action is performed.
      boolean canDo​(HPActor a)
      Returns if the given HPActor a can perform this action
      boolean isCastCommand()
      Returns if or not the action is a cast command.
      boolean isMoveCommand()
      Returns if or not the action is a move command.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.matter.ActionInterface

        compareTo, execute, getDescription, getDuration, getPriority

    • Method Detail

      • isMoveCommand

        boolean isMoveCommand()
        Returns if or not the action is a move command. Returns true if so, false otherwise

      • isCastCommand

        boolean isCastCommand()
        Returns if or not the action is a cast command. Returns true if so, false otherwise

      • canDo

        boolean canDo​(HPActor a)
        Returns if the given HPActor a can perform this action
        Parameters:
        a - the HPActor being queried
        Returns:
        true if a can perform this action, false otherwise

        a - the HPActor who performs this action.
